While using the [[Third Kazekage (puppet)|Third Kazekage]] [[puppet]], Sasori makes it grab the opponent and lift them into the air. Then he controls the puppet to make small spikes of [[Iron Sand]] fly towards and stab the limp opponent before exploding, knocking the opponent backwards.
